#summary Release notes

*Version 1.1.0*
 <ul> 
   <li>The layout of the windows and Swing components has been renovated to solve some problems found in different Look And Feel of Java used by operating systems.</li>
   <li>The main window now is not set as Always on Top.</li>
   <li>Fixed a bug with the ODBC Source Selection dialog in which the folder selection dialog (used to select the folder containing the DSN files) was always below that window.</li>
   <li>Added support for unixODBC on Unix systems (works only on the JRE provided by Oracle) *NOTE: Please read the Wiki page "How to Use"*</li>
</ul>

*Version 1.0.3*
 # Java classes have been recompiled with code level 1.6 instead of 1.7

*Version 1.0.2*
 # Fixed some problems due to the fact that unix uses a case-sensitive file system.

*Version 1.0.1*
 # Fixed several shortcomings in the translation 
 # The extension always stored the connection information. Not any more, is optional. 
 # The extension's options are now saved on metadata rather than to the user-defined attributes.

*Version 1.0*
  First release
